Hi,

I tried to set the scrollbar style using the "VSM GloosyBlack" template found somewhere here around.
While it works with "standard controls" I found no way to use this template with DataGrid.
It uses the style - but the vertical scrollbar shows the look of a horizontal (vertical displayed) scrollbar.

There is no must to use GloosyBlack (although I like it) - it would be enough to change the look of the scrollbar to "more blackish".

Manfred
